title: gamaka ezil
sahitya:
gamaka ezhil kamazhum nAdapriyE

nimalai undan nAmamdanai maravEn tAyE

(gamaka)

anupallavi

amara nilai tanda aRa vazhiyil piRanda

samarasa uNarvUTTum innisaiyil endRum negizhndiDum

(gamaka)

caraNam

mAniDa vAzhvin punida nilai uNarnda

gnAniyar yOgiyarum nALum uvanda

gAnam tanil nilai koNDavaL nIyE

yAnum undanaip pADa nATTaikKurinjciyil naLina naTamiDum

(gamaka)
